welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Kreuznach, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and savor the city's unique charm and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
